events.name: GA Open House + Happy Hour
events.description:
Do you want to learn more about our courses and discover what it's like to be a GA student? Join us at our Open House and find out more about what we do and what it means to be part of a network of 10,000 graduates around the globe. Furthermore, get a tour of our classrooms, check out student projects and our upcoming course offerings.

Not sure which course is the right fit for you? Have a one-on-one chat with a member of our team.

Stick around for some happy hour mix and mingle!

RSVP for free here: http://bit.ly/GAopenhouse
